usefulItems: plastic wrap, silicone bread mat, baking tray (30 x 40 cm), baking paper, rolling pin, refrigerator, oven
title: Classic Flammkuchen

ingredients.content: 1 spring onion/shallot, trimmed and cut into halves
100 g ham, cut into cubes (1-2 cm)
1 tbsp fresh chives, finely chopped for garnishing

preparations.content: Place flour, water, olive oil and salt into mixing bowl and knead <b>2 min/<b>. Transfer dough onto silicone bread mat or plastic wrap and shape into a ball. Wrap in plastic wrap and place into refrigerator to rest for 30 minutes. Clean and dry mixing bowl.
Preheat oven to 250°C. Line a baking tray (30 x 40 cm) with baking paper and set aside.
Transfer dough onto a silicone bread mat or lightly floured work surface and roll out into a rectangle (25 x 35 cm, 3 mm thickness). Place dough onto prepared baking tray and set aside.
Place spring onion/shallot into mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add sour cream, ham, salt, nutmeg and pepper and mix <b>10 sec//speed 3<b>.
Transfer mixture onto the middle of the dough and spread evenly, leaving a 1 cm border around all edges.
Bake for 15 minutes (250°C) or until crispy. Cut into 16 pieces, garnish with chives and serve immediately.

hintsAndTricks: Serve Flammkuchen fresh out of the oven while the crust is crispy.
Ham can be substituted with bacon or speck.
